description:
Phillip is from a former Soviet bloc country. He came to America in search of adventure.
"I consider that change is very good, and I'm not afraid of changes," he said.

"Well, obviously, you moved to a whole new country!"
"Yes!" he said with a smile.

"How many languages do you speak?"

"Fluently, three. And I speak some Polish too," he replied. "It just helps to get around."
Although he's made the United States his home, he still likes to travel.

"I'm just trying to learn some French right now because I'd really like to go to France."
Phillip is gay and he came out shortly after turning 18.

"When I was 18 I had five guys all together," he told us. "I just came out and five guys right away! It was great!"
He's very sexual and he wasn't shy about what he likes.

"I like very good oral so if a guy can give very good oral then that's a great plus," he said. "Probably deep throating."
On his sexual partners:

"I like them to be flexible, go I can come from any spot I want, from behind, from the side, from, you know, the top."

"So you're a top, you like to fuck?"
"I like to fuck!" he said, and then repeated: "I like to fuck."
Phillip has a nice uncut dick with a full bush.
"How big do you get when you get hard?"
"I think it's about seven and a half... I don't know, I've never measured," he said. "Usually, when I enter a guy, he's like... 'that feels good,' so I know it's good. I don't have to measure it, per se."
"You judge by their reactions?"
"Yeah, I judge by the way, how they moan."
On how guys react to his hairy chest:
"They like it. I've never shaved, so they like to sleep on it," he said. "After, you know, after I cum and after they cum, he just lays on top of me, and puts his head on my chest like a little puppy. It's kind of fun, I like it!"
title: Phillip
